app.title: AI Readiness Assessment
app.description: Assess your company's AI readiness and get expert guidance for implementation

expectationsList.evaluation: In-depth self-assessment of your AI readiness
expectationsList.recommendations: Personalized recommendations and solution provider matches
expectationsList.insights: Expert feedback on your goals and implementation path

home.timeEstimate: This assessment takes approximately 15-20 minutes to complete

interactiveCard.title: Start Your Journey
interactiveCard.description: Evaluate your AI readiness and get expert support for implementation

contextCard.title: About the Assessment
contextCard.description: This tool helps you understand where you stand with AI adoption and connects you with our team of experts and trusted solution providers who can help turn your goals into reality.

form.goalDescription: What business challenges would you like to solve with AI? This helps us understand your needs and match you with relevant experts and solution providers.
form.goalPlaceholder: Example: We want to reduce customer service response time, predict equipment maintenance needs, automate document processing, or improve inventory management...
form.companyTypeDescription: Select your company type to help us provide more relevant recommendations.

validation.required: Please fill in all required fields

assessment.title: AI Readiness Assessment
assessment.completeAllQuestions: Please answer all questions before proceeding

contextCard.title: Results Overview
contextCard.description: Here's a summary of your AI readiness assessment.
